commands.ping: Sends time to respond to command
commands.todo add [description]: Adds a point to the TODO list.
commands.todo remove [point number]: Removes the set point from the TODO list.
commands.todo search [search]: Searches through TODO list and returns mathces
commands.todo pick [optional search]: Returns random point in TODO list. Search will filter through points then pick (Optional).

admin_commands.exit: Saves and then closes bot script.
admin_commands.console: Sets the console channel with an ID.
